channel.title: Posts on Neelima's Blogs & Articles
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Neelima's Blogs & Articles

item.title: CDO Confessions Part 2: How to Tell If You’re Set Up to Win?
item.description: In Part 2 of CDO Confessions, we stop glamorizing and start reality checking: are you set up to win or just set up? I share a five-dimension checklist to help you self-assess the true state of your digital playground, governance, culture, tech, power, and value. It’s onion-peeling work (yes, there may be tears), but clarity is power. If you score high, you’re cleared for take-off; if not, time to rethink the flight plan.

item.title: CDO Confessions Part 1: Cracking The Role Code
item.description: The Chief Digital Officer role sounds glamorous, where business meets tech and magic happens. But in reality? It’s a balancing act between transformation dreams, political landmines, and endless firefighting. This blog slices through the hype with stories, frameworks, and a wink of humor to help you survive (and maybe even thrive) in the CDO hot seat.

item.title: When Data Flows Free: An EU Transformation
item.description: My journey with the EU Data Act began during a fascinating conversation with a colleague at a large automotive company. His deep expertise in automotive regulations sparked my curiosity about how this groundbreaking legislation would reshape our industry. As a software architect, I couldn’t help but dive deeper.
